page.title: 08Village Questionaire (1)
page.content: Our questionaire showed that most people liked the view, Tresillian, the river and the countryside. Nearly everybody said they liked the people because the people are friendly.Most people said the main reason for liking Tresillian is because the people are friendly and the population isn't great. {What changes has Tresillian gone {through in the past years?} Lots of people said that the roads have improved greatly through the years. But more traffic travels on the roads obviously that it did ever before. Because of the main road, more people have come to live in Tresillian.
